questions.questionText: When was Roger Federer born?
questions.info: Roger Federer was born on August 8, 1981 in Basel, Switzerland

questions.questionText: When was Rafael Nadal born?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal was born on June 3, 1986 in Manacor, Mallorca, Spain

questions.questionText: When was Novak Djokovic born?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic was born on May 22, 1987 in Belgrade, Serbia

questions.questionText: What year did Roger Federer turn pro?
questions.info: Roger Federer made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Rafael Nadal turn pro?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal made his debut on the ATP Tour in 1998.

questions.questionText: What year did Novak Djokovic turn pro?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic made his debut on the ATP Tour in 2003.

questions.questionText: When did Roger Federer win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2003.

questions.questionText: When did Rafael Nadal win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won Roland Garros, in 2005. He won on his first Roland Garros debut.

questions.questionText: When did Novak Djokovic win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won the Austrailian Open in 2008, becoming the first Serbian man to win a Grand Slam.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Roger Federer was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Roger Federer took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2004.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Rafael Nadal was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2008.

questions.questionText: What was the first year Novak Djokovic was Number One in the world?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic took the Number One ranking for his first time in 2011.

questions.questionText: How many years did Roger Federer finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Roger Federer finished Number One in the world for 5 years.

questions.questionText: How many years did Rafael Nadal finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal finished Number One in the world for 5 years.

questions.questionText: How many years did Novak Djokovic finish the season Number One in the world?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic finished Number One in the world for 7 years.

questions.questionText: How old was Roger Federer when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first Grand Slam, Wimbledon, at 21.

questions.questionText: How old was Rafael Nadal when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won his first Grand Slam at 24.

questions.questionText: How old was Novak Djokovic when he won his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won his first Grand Slam at 20.

questions.questionText: How old was Roger Federer when he turned pro?
questions.info: Roger Federer was 17 years old when he made his ATP Debut.

questions.questionText: How old was Rafael Nadal when he turned pro?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal turned pro at the young age of 15, but he didn't have much success initially.

questions.questionText: How old was Novak Djokovic when he turned pro?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic turned pro at 16, and 2 years after, he ended the year as the youngest player in the top 100.

questions.questionText: Who did Roger Federer beat in order to win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first Grand Slam beating Mark Philippousis in striaght sets.

questions.questionText: Who did Rafael Nadal beat in order to win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won his first Grand Slam beating Mariano Puerta in four sets.

questions.questionText: Who did Novak Djokovic beat in order to win his first Grand Slam?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won his first Grand Slam beating Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in four sets.

questions.questionText: On what surface did Roger Federer win his first ever ATP title?
questions.info: Roger Federer won his first ATP title, the Milan Indoor, on carpet courts.

questions.questionText: On what surface did Rafael Nadal win his first ever ATP title?
questions.info: Rafael Nadal won his first ATP title, the Croatia Open, on clay courts.

questions.questionText: On what surface did Novak Djokovic win his first ever ATP title?
questions.info: Novak Djokovic won his first ATP title, the Dutch Open, on clay courts. He didn't drop a set thorughout the entire tournament.

questions.questionText: What is Roger Federer's best singles Olympic result?
questions.info: Federer's best singles olympic result is a silver medal at the 2012 London Summer Olympic Games.

questions.questionText: What is Rafael Nadal's best singles Olympic result?
questions.info: Nadal's best singles olympic result is a gold metal at the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.

questions.questionText: What is Novak Djokovic's best singles Olympic result?
questions.info: Djokovic's best singles olympic result is a brozne medal at the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.

questions.questionText: Who did Roger Federer beat to win his first ATP match?
questions.info: Federer won his first ATP match against Guillaume Raoux in Toulouse.

questions.questionText: Who did Rafael Nadal beat to win his first ATP match?
questions.info: Nadal won his first ATP match against Ramón Delgado in Mallorca.

questions.questionText: What was Roger Federer's apparel sponsor between 2018 - 2021?
questions.info: Federer first signed with Nike footwear and apparel in 1994 and the sponsor chnaged to Uniqlo in 2018.

questions.questionText: What was Rafael Nadal's apparel sponsor between 2018 - 2021?
questions.info: Nike has sponsored Nadal since 2008 and the sponsorship is still going past 2021!

questions.questionText: What was Novak Djokovic's apparel sponsor between 2018 - 2021?
questions.info: Lacoste has sponsored Djokovic since 2017 and the sponsor has lasted past 2021, over 4 years later!

questions.questionText: What nationality did Djokovic represent in 2004?
questions.info: Djokovic represented Serbia and Montenegro from 2003 - 2006, but since 2006 he has represented Serbia.

questions.questionText: What is the URL of Roger Federer's offical website?
questions.info: Federer's offical website URL is rogerfederer.com.

questions.questionText: What is the URL of Rafael Nadal's offical website?
questions.info: Nadal's offical website URL is rafaelnadal.com.

questions.questionText: What is the URL of Novak Djokovic's offical website?
questions.info: Djokovic's offical website URL is novakdjokovic.com.

questions.questionText: What was Roger Federer's first watch sponsor?
questions.info: Federer's first watch sponsor was Rolex.

questions.questionText: What was Rafael Nadal's first watch sponsor?
questions.info: Nadal's first watch sponsor was Richard Mille.

questions.questionText: What was Novak Djokovic's first watch sponsor?
questions.info: Djokovic's first watch sponsor was Audemars Piguet, but in 2021 his watch sponsor is Hublot.

questions.questionText: What year did Roger Federer win his 5th Slam in?
questions.info: Federer won his 5th Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2005.

questions.questionText: What year did Rafael Nadal win his 5th Slam in?
questions.info: Nadal won his 5th Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2008.

questions.questionText: What year did Novak Djokovic win his 5th Slam in?
questions.info: Djokovic won his 5th Grand Slam, The Australian Open, in 2012.

questions.questionText: What year did Roger Federer win his 10th Slam in?
questions.info: Djokovic won his 10th Grand Slam, The Australian Open, in 2012.

questions.questionText: What year did Rafael Nadal win his 10th Slam in?
questions.info: Nadal won his 10th Grand Slam, Roland Garros, in 2011.

questions.questionText: What year did Novak Djokovic win his 10th Slam in?
questions.info: Djokovic won his 10th Grand Slam, The US Open, in 2011.

questions.questionText: What year did Roger Federer win his 15th Slam in?
questions.info: Federer won his 15th Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2009.

questions.questionText: What year did Rafael Nadal win his 15th Slam in?
questions.info: Nadal won his 15th Grand Slam, Roland Garros, in 2017.

questions.questionText: What year did Novak Djokovic win his 15th Slam in?
questions.info: Djokovic won his 15th Grand Slam, The Australian Open, in 2019.

questions.questionText: What year did Roger Federer win his 20th Slam in?
questions.info: Federer won his 20th Grand Slam, The Australian Open, in 2018.

questions.questionText: What year did Rafael Nadal win his 20th Slam in?
questions.info: Nadal won his 20th Grand Slam, Roland Garros, in 2020.

questions.questionText: What year did Novak Djokovic win his 20th Slam in?
questions.info: Djokovic won his 20th Grand Slam, Wimbledon, in 2021.

questions.questionText: How many Wimbledon titles has Roger Federer won?
questions.info: Federer has won 8 Wimbledon titles, an all-time record.

questions.questionText: How many Wimbledon titles has Rafael Nadal won?
questions.info: Nadal has won 2 Wimbledon titles, one quarter of how many Roger Federer has won.

questions.questionText: How many Wimbledon titles has Novak Djokovic won?
questions.info: Djokovic has won 5 Wimbledon titles, 3 more than Nadal, and 3 less than Roger Federer.

questions.questionText: How many Roland Garros titles has Roger Federer won?
questions.info: Federer has won 1 Roland Garros title, 12 less than Nadal.

questions.questionText: How many Roland Garros titles has Rafael Nadal won?
questions.info: Nadal has won 13 French Open titles which is a record for any player, male or female.

questions.questionText: How many Roland Garros titles has Novak Djokovic won?
questions.info: Nadal has won 13 French Open titles which is a record for any player, male or female.

questions.questionText: How many Australian Open titles has Roger Federer won?
questions.info: Federer has won 6 Australian Open titles, his most recent in 2018.

questions.questionText: How many Australian Open titles has Rafael Nadal won?
questions.info: Nadal has won 2 Australian Open titles, his most recent in 2022 after beating Daniil Medvedev in the final.

questions.questionText: How many Australian Open titles has Novak Djokovic won?
questions.info: Djokovic has won 9 Australian Open titles, he's never lost a Australian Open final.

questions.questionText: How many US Open titles has Roger Federer won?
questions.info: Federer has won 5 US Open titles, he's lost 2 US Open finals; one to Djokovic and one to Del Potro.

questions.questionText: How many US Open titles has Rafael Nadal won?
questions.info: Nadal has won 4 US Open titles, and he's lost one in the final to Novak Djokovic.

questions.questionText: How many US Open titles has Novak Djokovic won?
questions.info: Djokovic has won 3 US Open titles, he's lost 6 US Open finals.
